item.title: Miscellaneous
item.description: Monitor ipv4 address for a hostname using macOS DNS resolver dns-sd -G v4 <hostname> Ping a host given number of times ping -c <number> <hostname> Query IP address of a hostname nslookup <hostname> Query IP address of a hostname from a specific DNS server nslookup <hostname> <dns server address> Example nslookup google.com 8.8.8.8 Query specific field from DNS server nslookup -query=<field name> <hostname> Example nslookup -query=cname google.com 8.8.8.8 Find open ports Linux netstat -plant macOS Using netstat
